name: PostContrast
description:
by Toska and emptity

Third person shooter, in which once a colorful world was occupied
by gloom, dooming it's lonely resident to deal with greyness
by using and mixing vibrant paint.

This is Cmyk. They like graffiti.
They mostly works with such colors as cyan, yellow and magenta.

Their city was filled with black blobs, bereaving all brightness and color. 

Cmyk wants to destroy the source of the darkness - tower in the centre of the city. On the way there he will fing legacy from the fallen ones.
